item.description:
The world is always handing you adventures and support. Are you confident enough to accept that you deserve it and open your arms and accept it? From the time you are born you are bombarded with mixed messages. Do this, don’t do that. You need to speak up, you need to be quiet. It is no surprise that many people can’t decipher between what to take on and what to let go of. In many cases the ones that are suppose to nurture us, teach us and care for us are actually uncaring, attacking and bring us to feelings of unworthiness. It is time to put all that aside and decide that you are the best, no one can touch you unless you allow it and make a deliberate plan to be the best you can be, because, You deserve it. Learn some great tools and learn to love yourself no matter what anyone else thinks!

 

 

Instructor is Dr. Erika Duffy and she will be able to speake to you on many levels.

Cost is $10.00 per person.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: The Joy of Self Confidence
